author: Lolita C. Baldor
title: Reinstate? Reassign? Navy to decide fate of fired captain...
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Navy’s top admiral will soon decide the fate of the ship captain who was fired after pleading for commanders to move faster to safeguard his coronavirus-infected crew on the...
content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The Navys top admiral will soon decide the fate of the ship captain who was fired after pleading for commanders to move faster to safeguard his coronavirus-infected crew on the USS Theodore Roosevelt.
